trips.title: Paris Adventure
trips.description: Explore the best of Paris in 4 days, including iconic landmarks, museums, and charming neighborhoods.

stops.title: Eiffel Tower
stops.description: Visit the iconic Eiffel Tower and enjoy panoramic views of Paris.
stops.notes: Consider visiting early in the morning to avoid long queues.

stops.title: Champs-Élysées
stops.description: Stroll down the famous avenue and enjoy shopping and cafes.
stops.notes: Great place for a leisurely walk and some shopping.

stops.title: Louvre Museum
stops.description: Explore the world's largest art museum, home to the Mona Lisa.
stops.notes: Plan at least half a day to explore the museum's vast collections.

stops.title: Seine River Cruise
stops.description: Enjoy a relaxing cruise along the Seine River, with views of Paris's landmarks.
stops.notes: Evening cruises offer beautiful views of the city illuminated.

stops.title: Montmartre & Sacré-Cœur
stops.description: Explore the artistic neighborhood of Montmartre and visit the Sacré-Cœur Basilica.
stops.notes: Walk up the steps for a great view of Paris.

stops.title: Moulin Rouge
stops.description: Experience the vibrant cabaret show at the world-famous Moulin Rouge.
stops.notes: Book tickets in advance for the best seating.

stops.title: Notre-Dame Cathedral
stops.description: Visit the Gothic masterpiece and climb the towers for a stunning view.
stops.notes: Check restoration status as the cathedral is undergoing repairs.

stops.title: Luxembourg Gardens
stops.description: Relax in the beautiful Luxembourg Gardens, a perfect spot for a picnic.
stops.notes: Ideal for a leisurely afternoon in a peaceful setting.

trips.title: Italian Journey
trips.description: Experience the beauty of Italy over 10 days, visiting iconic cities and enjoying local culture and cuisine.

stops.title: Colosseum
stops.description: Visit the ancient Roman Colosseum, a symbol of the Eternal City.
stops.notes: Arrive early to avoid crowds.

stops.title: Roman Forum
stops.description: Explore the ruins of ancient Rome, including temples, arches, and markets.
stops.notes: Consider a guided tour to fully appreciate the history.

stops.title: Vatican Museums
stops.description: See the vast art collections of the Vatican, including the Sistine Chapel.
stops.notes: Book tickets in advance to skip the line.

stops.title: St. Peter's Basilica
stops.description: Visit one of the world's largest and most beautiful churches.
stops.notes: Climb to the top of the dome for an amazing view of Rome.

stops.title: Pantheon
stops.description: Marvel at the ancient Roman temple, now a church, with its stunning dome.
stops.notes: The Pantheon is free to enter, but check opening hours.

stops.title: Piazza Navona
stops.description: Relax in one of Rome's most beautiful squares, surrounded by Baroque architecture.
stops.notes: Great place to enjoy a coffee or gelato.

stops.title: Florence - Duomo
stops.description: Visit Florence's Cathedral with its iconic dome designed by Brunelleschi.
stops.notes: Climb to the top for a breathtaking view of the city.

stops.title: Uffizi Gallery
stops.description: Explore one of the most famous art museums in the world, home to works by Leonardo da Vinci and Michelangelo.
stops.notes: Book tickets in advance to avoid the long lines.

stops.title: Ponte Vecchio
stops.description: Walk along Florence's most famous bridge, lined with jewelry shops.
stops.notes: The bridge is especially beautiful at sunset.

stops.title: Pitti Palace & Boboli Gardens
stops.description: Explore the grand palace and its expansive gardens.
stops.notes: The gardens offer a peaceful retreat from the city.

stops.title: Venice - St. Mark's Basilica
stops.description: Visit the stunning basilica in the heart of Venice.
stops.notes: Dress modestly to enter the basilica.

stops.title: Doge's Palace
stops.description: Explore the historical seat of Venetian power.
stops.notes: Don't miss the Bridge of Sighs.

stops.title: Grand Canal
stops.description: Take a gondola ride through Venice's most famous waterway.
stops.notes: Gondola rides can be expensive, so consider a group ride.

stops.title: Rialto Bridge
stops.description: Walk across Venice's oldest bridge and enjoy views of the Grand Canal.
stops.notes: A popular spot for photos, but be prepared for crowds.

stops.title: Milan - The Last Supper
stops.description: See Leonardo da Vinci's masterpiece in the refectory of the Convent of Santa Maria delle Grazie.
stops.notes: Booking in advance is essential.

stops.title: Milan Cathedral
stops.description: Visit the impressive Gothic cathedral, one of the largest in the world.
stops.notes: Climb to the rooftop for panoramic views of the city.

stops.title: Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II
stops.description: Shop or dine in one of the world's oldest shopping malls, known for its architecture.
stops.notes: A great place to enjoy a coffee and people-watch.

stops.title: Sforza Castle
stops.description: Explore the castle and its museums, which house works by Michelangelo.
stops.notes: Don't miss the beautiful courtyards and gardens.

stops.title: Lake Como
stops.description: Take a day trip to the stunning Lake Como, surrounded by mountains and picturesque villages.
stops.notes: Consider a boat tour to fully appreciate the beauty of the lake.

stops.title: Bellagio
stops.description: Visit the charming village of Bellagio, known as the 'Pearl of Lake Como.'
stops.notes: Enjoy a leisurely walk through the narrow streets and lakeside views.
